snippet: Meg Cabot plans to publish two new Princess Diaries books in 2015, including a novel for adult readers and the first in a middle-grade series.
abstract: Meg Cabot plans to publish two new Princess Diaries books in 2015, including a novel for adult readers and the first in a middle-grade series.

headline.main: New 'Princess Diaries' Books Coming, for Older and Younger Readers
